DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety tolerability multiple dos PF 02545920 administer orally psychiatrically stable subject schizophrenia receive background antipsychotic +/- adjunctive medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Examine The Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of PF-02545920 In Psychiatrically Stable Subjects With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Psychiatrically stable subject schizophrenia . Evidence stable schizophrenia symptomatology great equal 3 month . Subjects must stable medication treatment regimen great equal 2 month , include concomitant psychotropic medication . History seizures condition risk seizure . Subjects electroconvulsive therapy within 6 month prior randomization . Pregnant nursing female , female child bear potential .
